name: CNN
text:
As the coronavirus pandemic continues, science writer David Quammen joins @andersoncooper and @drsanjaygupta for "Coronavirus: Facts and fears."

Watch CNN: https://t.co/UYpqI3w42L
Follow live updates: https://t.co/MIvm5ZJQGy
Tweet questions with #CNNTownHall https://t.co/T4MIEVYWlW

name: CNN
text: Face masks worn at home can help to stop the spread of coronavirus among people who live together, but it’s only protective before someone starts showing symptoms, according to a new study. Disinfecting surfaces regularly was also helpful, the study said. https://t.co/B944jm3XVF

name: CNN
text:
St. Paul, Minn., Police Chief Todd Axtell calls the death of George Floyd “dehumanizing.”

“We're here to protect people. We are here to serve people. We are here to be the guardians of our community — not to choke people up.” https://t.co/7aRkQvWhVU https://t.co/qPM1L4p0GB

name: CNN
text:
Stephen Jackson, former NBA player and friend of George Floyd, called Floyd his “twin.”

“This is not the way he was supposed to go. He didn't deserve that, but the way that people are supporting him, standing up for him … his death will not be in vain.” https://t.co/tiDPefVEYJ https://t.co/H7raEYN0JA

name: CNN
text:
Montgomery, Alabama, Mayor Steven Reed says the entire city only has two ICU beds available.

“We're not doing better, we're actually doing worse, unfortunately. … We are in a place that would be considered a crisis at this moment.” https://t.co/sacmHiaru2 https://t.co/PWvCJkRbHb

name: CNN
text:
Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey says he will be bringing in resources from around Minnesota to “restore peace and security.”

“This work is about protecting community. This work is about protecting infrastructure needed to get through this pandemic together.” https://t.co/wOvnup3IPh https://t.co/nt0LzUUZ95

name: CNN
text: Britain will begin lifting coronavirus restrictions starting Monday in a phased approach, UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson says https://t.co/8RKMl5iHZP

text: "There have been a lot of people who have had to die this way for us to generate this amount of conversation, and t… https://t.co/9vNnFas2wZ

name: CNN
text: “It’s a bit of a surprise that we haven’t yet seen transmission take off.” Dr. Christopher Murray, a researcher behind an influential coronavirus model from the U. of Washington, discusses why the latest model projection is lower than the previous one. https://t.co/d1NKQE5HUF https://t.co/xCIcs4Fuv0

name: CNN
text:
Writer David Quammen predicted a pandemic like Covid-19 in his 2012 book.

"I was listening to a select group of shrewd infectious disease scientists, and they were saying... 'It's coming. It will be a virus out of an animal, possibly a bat.'" https://t.co/EozxjX8z8J #CNNTownHall https://t.co/JriG5J35W0

name: CNN
text: RT @CNNSitRoom: “I kept saying, as I’m watching this, ‘is this some sort of a joke?’ How much more video do they need?” CNN’s @donlemon reacts to the fact that no charges were announced against the officers involved in George Floyd’s death during an FBI news conference. https://t.co/EMnUWFbzgo“I kept saying, as I’m watching this, ‘is this some sort of a joke?’ How much more video do they need?” CNN’s… https://t.co/EyDg41RwvT

name: CNN
text: Administration officials said President Trump fired the State Department's IG this month because his office was suspected of leaking to the media — but an independent investigation earlier this year found Steve Linick and his office had done no such thing https://t.co/HhaUBXnUxA

name: CNN
text: The Trump administration is testing part of the US-Mexico border wall with black coating, a move that comes after President Trump expressed his desire to paint his signature wall black but also could cost an extra $1 million per mile https://t.co/ZRtjyfUIeT

name: CNN
text:
The World Health Organization recommends at least one meter, equal to about 3 1/2 feet, for social distancing.

"The longer the distance, the better, obviously," says the group's technical lead, @mvankerkhove. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/6WLe5vTA6g https://t.co/Khk3mANAsS

name: CNN
text:
There are a handful of things Americans can do to protect themselves and others if they decide to eat out during the coronavirus pandemic.

@drsanjaygupta shares a few tips, including bringing your own cleaning wipes. #CNNTownHall https://t.co/uJhjYLP3Td https://t.co/NkI2tcq7qB

name: CNN
text: "I pretend that he is not going to be missing from every event going forward. That's the only way to get through th… https://t.co/UPjPrfgaKK

name: CNN
text:
President Trump has complained this week about social media companies, repeatedly accusing them of censoring conservative voices and even signing an executive order seeking to limit their power. 

But data from Facebook pours cold water on that assertion. https://t.co/mfXBepikoV

name: CNN
text: Materials on altars from a religious shrine at a biblical site in Israel contained cannabis and frankincense, according to a new study. This is the first time that physical evidence of cannabis has been identified in the Ancient Near East, researchers say. https://t.co/bDZGs8t2Yb

name: CNN
text:

name: CNN
text: Mayor Jacob Frey has declared a local emergency in Minneapolis due to civil disturbances in the city, according to a declaration issued by his office https://t.co/zYfHEIBtXJ

name: CNN
text: Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto announced that she was withdrawing her name from former Vice President Joe Biden's search for a running mate https://t.co/bWjoKFQdKq

name: CNN
text: A contingent of House Republicans continues to defy the recommendations of public health experts and Congress' top physician to wear face coverings to limit the spread of Covid-19 — even when they're unable to maintain a social distance https://t.co/mFkyntY4GX

name: CNN
text: "I heard [George] Floyd scream 'Mama,' and through my tears, even though I knew the events in the video had already unfolded to a tragic conclusion, I was still ready to fight. He wasn't my baby, but he was someone's child." | Christy Oglesby, @CNNOpinion https://t.co/ztqPgZCWhp

name: CNN
text: Danielle Gletow and her organization, One Simple Wish, are making sure children in foster care — and those who have aged out of the system — have the support they need during the pandemic https://t.co/juPS0W1OT6

name: CNN
text:
RT @CuomoPrimeTime: "We are really just battling one problem. America as a tale of two cities," says @chriscuomo on the death of George Floyd.

"One the majority, one the minority. The last three months exposed these parallel Americas." https://t.co/392k0RMna4"We are really just battling one problem. America as a tale of two cities," says @chriscuomo on the death of George… https://t.co/dAaXukA2cK

name: CNN
text:
RT @CNNTonight: "The trauma that is in our communities is devastating, and it is brought on by this really horrible disease that is racism."

CNN's @DonLemon speaks with Andrea Jenkins, who represents Minneapolis City Council Ward 8, where George Floyd died after an officer knelt on his neck. https://t.co/BLC4q0GUHv"The trauma that is in our communities is devastating, and it is brought on by this really horrible disease that is… https://t.co/g2lNjtrzwt

name: CNN
text: As the American death count from coronavirus ticks above 100,000, the panel assembled by President Trump to confront the pandemic has been sharply curtailed as the White House looks ahead to reopening https://t.co/nuFjl3R3ab

name: CNN
text: "The pain and sorrow of black Americans is not only real, but it has authored the true story of America. My father passed this story down to me, but I refuse to pass it down to my children," @Bakari_Sellers writes for @CNNOpinion https://t.co/Dgftq4G1a0

name: CNN
text: Iowa Rep. Steve King has been holding on to his 4th District House seat by his fingernails for much of the past few years. Writing his political obituary before all the votes are counted is a dicey proposition. | Analysis by @CillizzaCNN https://t.co/5zwc4Ut1CU

name: CNN
text:
The "wolf warriors" represent a different type of diplomat to the famously bland Chinese foreign representatives.

They are taking to Twitter and other social media platforms to hit back directly at any criticism of China or the ruling Communist Party. https://t.co/clbugWmccJ

name: CNN
text: The Senate committee chairman leading the probe into the origins of the FBI's Russia investigation is asking for broad authorization to issue subpoenas to a number of top former Obama administration officials, including former FBI Director James Comey https://t.co/gRj5LshjgY

name: CNN
text:
For years in the Gilgo Beach, New York, multiple-victim investigation, she was "Jane Doe #6."

Now, New York's Suffolk County Police Department has confirmed the remains of Valerie Mack, a 24-year-old Philadelphia mother who went missing two decades ago. https://t.co/ALh517qVt8

name: CNN
text:
One way to stem the loss of employment during the coronavirus pandemic could be job-sharing, which means employers would reduce workers' hours instead of instituting layoffs or furloughs.

Here's what this could look like, and some of the pros and cons. https://t.co/DA07LuiLNs

name: CNN
text: As the coronavirus' death toll in the US surpasses 100,000 victims, @drsanjaygupta takes a moment to reflect on this tragic milestone and commemorate those we've lost https://t.co/JsefBZtEHX

name: CNN
text: Adidas and Allbirds are joining forces to create a high-performance sneaker with the lowest possible carbon emissions. It's an unusual partnership of two competitors in the fast-growing eco-friendly footwear space. https://t.co/oBMDA9qIjS

name: CNN
text: The Republican National Committee and the organizers of its national convention sent North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper a letter that laid out a set of protocols the RNC is willing to implement in order to safely hold its planned August convention in Charlotte https://t.co/21jYrV47Yo

name: CNN
text: "Refusing to wear a mask is becoming akin to wearing a MAGA hat, a sign of pro-Trump defiance ... but one that will prolong the crisis, lead to more people dying, and make it more difficult for the economy to recover," @FridaGhitis writes for @CNNOpinion https://t.co/Xj18MhFdmj
